mapper.select: SELECT ps_product.id_product AS productId, ps_category_lang.`name` AS categoryName, ps_product_lang.`name` AS productName, id_category_default AS categoryId, price FROM ps_product LEFT JOIN ps_product_lang ON ps_product.id_product = ps_product_lang.`id_product` AND ps_product_lang.`id_lang` = 6 LEFT JOIN `ps_category` ON ps_product.`id_category_default` = ps_category.`id_category` LEFT JOIN ps_category_lang ON ps_category.`id_category` = ps_category_lang.`id_category` AND ps_category_lang.`id_lang` = 6
